EmailTemplate.name: Quote approved Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote(s) Approved - Employer Name: {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Quote: {!Proposal__c.Name} for {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c}, {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been approved by Sales Team.
Thank you.
